attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like to be the first to create a petition on 10 Downing Street website to get our very own much loved Ihtisham Hussain aka Shammy aka Bighead an MBE! The lad is a through and through living legend and has given so much to the community in past present and im sure....future!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
